Project: Tangled

[Tangled]() is an everyday customer relationship management system  to help you keep track of your customers, tasks, appointments, etc. The Tangled is offered as an open-source,

### Team members: 
- [HassanHamdanDev](https://github.com/HassanHamdanDev)

### Setup

#### `.env` requirements

i.e.

- `PORT` - 3001
- `PostgreSQL` -
- `base-64": "^1.0.0"`
- `bcrypt": "^5.0.1"`
- `cors: "^2.8.5"`
- `dotenv: "^8.2.0"`
- `express: "^4.17.1"`
- `jest: "^26.6.3"`
- `jsonwebtoken: "^8.5.1"`
- `method-override: "^3.0.0"`
- `postgresql: "^5.12.1"`
- `morgan: "^1.10.0"`



#### How to initialize/run your application (where applicable)

- `npm init -y`
- `npm install`
- `npm start`
- `node index.js`


#### Tests

- npm test
